{{dcl|
reference back();
}}
{{dcl|
const_reference back() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns reference to the last element in the queue. This is the most recently pushed element. Effectively calls {{c|c.back()}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Reference to the last element.

===Complexity===
Constant.
